content: Hi KantaPHR people @Anssi Hämäläinen @Anna Korpela and Omaolo @JaniHarju (SoteDigi), how about taking a look at this activity and considering how it might play a role in the context of KantaPHR and Omaolo: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2020-05+Cross+Organization+Application+Access
From app developer's point-of-view would be awesome to get something like this embedded into the Finnish national healthcare IT infrastructure.
Thanks for the tip Mikael, we'll take a look at this
